name: Chroma Conundrum
description:
Title: Chroma Conundrum
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Puzzle
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview:

Use your wits and your creativity to solve puzzles in this colorful top down puzzle game! Change your color by absorbing it from the environment. Absorb certain amounts of a color to interact with specific objects in each level.  Mix colors together, and find a way to escape each level.

Instructions:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move your character around each stage. Press Space to interact with object when applicable.
Game Design Team
Kyle Marshall – Game Designer
